attributes.action: Healthy food options should be cheaper. You can get a cake cheaper than fruit.
attributes.background: Healthy food should be more affordable. Currently at Greggs you can get a cake for less than £1 whereas a pot of fruit is close on £2. It is more expensive to eat healthily and we wonder why so many people choose the cheaper unhealthier option.

rejection.details:
At the moment, the price of food is the responsibility of retailers, not the UK Government or Parliament.

If you'd like the UK Government or Parliament to act, you could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
